mapper.select: SELECT `ORDER`.ID as ORDER_ID, `ORDER`.ORDER_TIME as ORDER_TIME, `ORDER`.START_TIME as START_TIME, `ORDER`.END_TIME as END_TIME, `ORDER`.STATUS as ORDER_STATUS, `USER`.ID as USER_ID, `FIELD`.ID as FIELD_ID, `FIELD`.FIELD_NAME as FIELD_ID, `FIELD`.TYPE as FIELD_TYPE, `FIELD`.ADDRESS as FIELD_ADDRESS, `USER`.USERNAME as USERNAME, `USER`.NICKNAME as NICKNAME, `USER`.STATUS as USER_STATUS, `USER`.PHONE as PHONE, `PLAYGROUND`.ID as GROUND_ID, `PLAYGROUND`.GROUND_NAME as GROUND_NAME FROM USER INNER JOIN `ORDER` ON USER.ID = `ORDER`.USER_ID INNER JOIN FIELD ON FIELD.ID = `ORDER`.FIELD_ID INNER JOIN PLAYGROUND ON PLAYGROUND.ID = FIELD.GROUND_ID ${ew.customSqlSegment}
